Text: Unauthorized use of Houston Pipe Line Company Name Cc Mark I would appreciate it if you could get back to me as soon as possible on the issue of Enrons continued use of the HPL name on the EOL documents In my letter of September th I had requested Enron remedy this situation by October st but that has not happened Im sure you can appreciate our interest in resolving this matter promptly so please let me hear from you as soon as possible Thank you Sandi Braband Senior Counsel
